references.paper_title: The relationship between precision-recall and ROC curves
references.reason: This paper is frequently misattributed as the origin of the claim that AUPRC is superior to AUROC in class-imbalance scenarios, despite not making that claim.

references.paper_title: Unachievable region in precision-recall space and its effect on empirical evaluation
references.reason: This paper establishes a theoretical framework for understanding the relationship between AUROC and AUPRC and is relevant to the paper's theoretical analysis.
This paper offers valuable practical guidance for researchers by emphasizing appropriate use cases for AUROC and AUPRC, complementing the paper's technical advancement.

references.paper_title: Precrec: fast and accurate precision-recall and ROC curve calculations in R
references.reason: This paper provides practical tools that researchers can use to accurately assess the AUPRC and AUROC, and which may be relevant for future work in the paper.

references.paper_title: Transformer-based biomarker prediction from colorectal cancer histology: A large-scale multicentric study
references.reason: This paper exemplifies the misuse of AUPRC that the paper seeks to correct, highlighting the real-world consequences of improper metric selection in high-stakes domains.
